sentences.en: Buyer to prepay all shipping, handling, and insurance costs.
sentences.cn: 买方预付所有运输, 装卸, 保险等费用.

sentences.en: If the issuer decides to prepay the bonds, the issuer must pay a premium.
sentences.cn: 如果发行方决定提前支付债券，就必须支付贴补利息。

sentences.en: In their previous hosting service they had to prepay for a month at a time
sentences.cn: 在之前的托管服务上，我们必须要预付一个月的费用。

sentences.en: Normally, the seller is obligated to prepay the ocean freight.
sentences.cn: 通常情况下, 卖方有义务预付海运费.

sentences.en: Participation in the program would be voluntary and participants could prepay the government loan at any time.
sentences.cn: 参加这以项目是自愿的，参与者可以在任何时间将贷款预付给政府。

sentences.en: PCB or Quick Connecting for Popwer Switching, for Prepay Meter System, Power Station, Electric Motorbike System.
sentences.cn: 用于电力开关 、 预测系统 、 发电站 、 电动摩托车的PCB或快速连接的磁保持继电器.

sentences.en: Prior to the maturity of the loan, the mortgagor cannot prepay the loan.
sentences.cn: 贷款未到期, 抵押单位不能提前归还.

sentences.en: Q 3: What are the treatments prepay?
sentences.cn: 问: 哪些护理是拥有折扣优惠的?

sentences.en: There are those who prepare their income taxes in February, prepay mortgages and serve precisely planned dinners at an ungodly 6:30 p. m.
sentences.cn: 有些人二月份九准备好交个人所得税，预先偿还抵押借款，按计划准时在常人难以忍受的六点半开饭；

sentences.en: This time, thanks to the card, I had managed to prove knowledge of where I was going and was spared the hassle of having to pick and prepay for a state-operated hotel at the airport.
sentences.cn: 多亏了这张卡片，这一次，我在机场清楚了自己该往哪儿走，省下了挑选、预付国有宾馆的麻烦。

sentences.en: You can make order, but you have to prepay half of the subscription, OK ?
sentences.cn: 8订做可以, 先交订金一半,货到款付清, 怎么样 ?

words.tran_cn: 预付（prepay的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to pay for something before you need it or use it
